alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 10:38AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Snow Showers to Continue Into Tuesday Afternoon... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to Moderate Snow Showers. Additional accumulations up to an inch in the lower elevations, with an additional 1 to 2 inches in the higher elevations of northwest Wyoming. * WHERE...The Mountains of Northwest Wyoming, including eastern foothills of the Absarokas into the Cody Foothills. * WHEN...Through Late Tuesday Afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be difficult at times, particularly with slick roads and in areas where snow showers reduce visibility. Mountain passes are the most vulnerable.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park
